column4: What's the difference between Libre Office and Open Office, and why did the default processor change from 10.4 to 11.10?
libre is a fork, due to unclear support of openoffice's new owner - for you it should be the same
for me it should be the same?
at the time of the fork taking place, both software products are 100% identical, then some names and logos get changed.... and thats where we are almost at
